l10n_info.welcome_prompt: Welcome to RSS to Telegram Bot.
l10n_info.rsstt_slogan: RSS to Telegram Bot, a Telegram RSS bot that cares about your reading experience.

l10n_error_reasons.flood_wait_prompt: You are operating too frequently that the bot has exceeded the rate limit of Telegram. Please slow down.
l10n_error_reasons.edit_conflict_prompt: You are operating too frequently that operation conflicts. Please slow down.
l10n_error_reasons.callback_already_running_prompt: You have requested another command. Please retry after it finishes.
l10n_error_reasons.message_too_long_prompt: The command should have been executed successfully, but the return message is too long to send.

l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_no_permission: You don't have permission to use this command.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_not_bot_manager: This command can only be used by the bot manager.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_not_chat_admin: This command can only be used by the admins of this group/channel.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_not_in_private_chat: This command can only be used in a private chat.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_not_member: You are not in this group/channel, thus cannot use the bot.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_bot_not_member: The bot is no longer in this group/channel, thus won't work here.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_switch_pm: Continue in the private chat with the bot…
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_input_command: Please input a command to continue…
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.permission_denied_no_direct_use: This command should not be used directly. Use %s instead.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.promote_to_admin_prompt: If you are an anonymous admin of this group, please promote the bot to an admin (no permission needed) to empower the bot to verify your identity.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.group_upgrade_needed_prompt:
Oops, your group hasn't been upgraded to a supergroup. Generally, the Telegram server should automatically perform this upgrade at some time, but if not, you have to upgrade it manually before you can use the bot.
Please follow these steps:
1. Goto the group info, then click "Manage group".
2. Change "Chat history for new members" to "Visible".
3. Save chat history visibility setting.
4. Save all settings.
5. (Optional) If needed, you can change "Chat history for new members" to "Hidden" again.
6. Now you should be able to use the bot.
l10n_permission_denied_reasons.sub_limit_reached_prompt: The quantity of your subscriptions has reached the limit (%d/%d) applied by the bot manager. Please remove (/unsub) some subscriptions before adding new ones.

l10n_misc.processing: Processing, please wait for a moment…

l10n_cmd_sub.sub_reply_feed_url_prompt_html: Please reply to this message with the URL of an RSS feed. Or, you may use /sub url1 url2 url3 … to subscribe in bulk.
l10n_cmd_sub.sub_usage_in_channel_html: Please use /sub url1 url2 url3 … to subscribe.

l10n_cmd_unsub.unsub_choose_sub_prompt_html: Please choose a subscription you'd like to unsubscribe from. Or, you may use /unsub url1 url2 url3 … to unsubscribe in bulk.

l10n_cmd_unsub_all.unsub_all_confirm_prompt: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from all subscriptions?

l10n_cmd_import.send_opml_prompt: Please send me the OPML file to be imported (extension name must be .opml).
l10n_cmd_import.import_for_channel_or_group_prompt: If you want to import subscriptions for your channel/group, please fill in the caption with the channel/group's ID (must start with '-100') or @username.
l10n_cmd_import.send_opml_reply_placeholder: The OPML file to be imported (extension name must be .opml)
l10n_cmd_import.opml_import_processing: If the quantity of feeds is large or feed servers are slow, it can be a long wait. Sit back and relax.
l10n_cmd_import.keep_subs_title_button: Keep the custom titles of imported subscriptions
l10n_cmd_import.delete_subs_title_button: Delete the custom titles of imported subscriptions

l10n_cmd_set.set_choose_sub_prompt: Please choose a subscription you'd like to customize.
l10n_cmd_set.display_via_-4: No feed title, bare URL at the end
l10n_cmd_set.display_via_-3: No feed title, link displayed as post title
l10n_cmd_set.display_via_-1: No feed title, hyperlink at the end
l10n_cmd_set.display_via_1: Feed title and link displayed as post title
l10n_cmd_set.set_length_limit_prompt:
Please select a length limit.

If a post is longer than the limit OR cannot be sent in a single message, it will be sent via Telegraph.
If sending via Telegraph fails, only its title and source will be sent.
l10n_cmd_set.length_limit_only_effective_if_send_mode: The length limit is effective only when send mode is auto.
l10n_cmd_set.display_media_only_effective_if_send_mod: The current send mode will never display media in Telegram messages.
l10n_cmd_set.read_formatting_settings_guidebook_html: Read the formatting settings guidebook here.

l10n_cmd_set_default.set_user_default_description:
Set the default settings for subscriptions.

The unset settings of a subscription will fall back to the settings on this page. It is useful if you want to set the same settings for most of your subscriptions.
l10n_cmd_set_default.reset_all_button: Reset all subscriptions to my default
l10n_cmd_set_default.reset_all_confirm_prompt: Are you sure you want to reset all subscriptions to your default?
l10n_cmd_set_default.reset_all_confirm: Yes, reset all subscriptions to my default
l10n_cmd_set_default.reset_all_successful: Reset all subscriptions to default successfully

l10n_sub_info.default_emoji_header_description: %s means that the subscription is using your default settings. You can change them by using /set_default.

l10n_monitor_warn.feed_deactivated_warn:
The monitoring task had failed 100 consecutive times. Your subscription to the RSS feed has been deactivated.
To reactivate it, please use the /activate_subs command.

l10n_cmd_activate.choose_sub_to_be_activated:
The subscriptions below are deactivated, choose one to activate.
After being activated, their updates will be monitored.

l10n_cmd_deactivate.choose_sub_to_be_deactivated:
The subscriptions below are activated, choose one to deactivate.
After being deactivated, their updates will be suspended from monitoring. If you don't need the subscription anymore, please consider unsubscribing it instead of deactivating it.

l10n_cmd_set_title.cmd_set_title_usage_prompt_html: Command usage: /set_title sub_id title Note: omit title to clear custom title (only if previously set, otherwise get this prompt).
l10n_cmd_set_title.set_title_success: The custom title of the subscription has been changed to:
l10n_cmd_set_title.set_title_success_cleared: The custom title of the subscription has been cleared.

l10n_cmd_set_interval.cmd_set_interval_usage_prompt_html: Command usage: /set_interval sub_id monitor_interval Note: monitor_interval must be a positive integer in minutes (no need to include the unit).
l10n_cmd_set_interval.set_interval_success_html: The monitor interval of the subscription has been changed to %d minutes.
l10n_cmd_set_interval.set_default_interval_success_html: The default monitor interval has been changed to %d minutes.
l10n_cmd_set_interval.set_interval_failure_too_small_html: The monitor interval must be greater than %d minutes.

l10n_cmd_set_hashtags.cmd_set_hashtags_usage_prompt_html: Command usage: /set_hashtags sub_id #hashtag1 #hashtag2 … Note: if no hashtag provided, existing hashtags will be cleared (only if previously set, otherwise get this prompt).
l10n_cmd_set_hashtags.set_hashtags_success_html: The custom hashtags of the subscription has been changed to:
l10n_cmd_set_hashtags.set_hashtags_success_cleared: The custom hashtags of the subscription has been cleared.
l10n_cmd_set_hashtags.set_hashtags_failure_too_many: Too many hashtags. Please remove some hashtags and retry.

l10n_administration.option_value_invalid: The option value is invalid, please check its type
l10n_administration.user_not_found: The user was not found. Use their user ID instead.
l10n_administration.user_state_description_0: can use the bot only if multi-user mode is enabled
l10n_administration.reset_sub_limit_to_default: Reset subscription quantity limit to default
l10n_administration.cmd_set_sub_limit_prompt_html: Command usage: /set_sub_limit user_id subscription_quantity_limit Note: subscription_quantity_limit must be a integer, -1 for unlimited.

l10n_cmd_descriptions.cmd_description_import: Import subscriptions from an OPML file
l10n_cmd_descriptions.cmd_description_export: Export subscriptions to an OPML file
l10n_cmd_descriptions.usage_in_channel_or_group_prompt_html: Usage in channel/group: 1. Add the bot to your channel/group. 2a. Directly send commands in the channel/group. 2b. Or alternatively, you can send commands like /sub @username https://example.com or /sub -10010000000000 https://example.com in the private chat with the bot. (@username is the channel/group's username, @ is required; -10010000000000 is the channel/group's ID, it must start with -100)
